Package com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpenColorPickerListener
    This listener interface provides the callback methods for color picker events in the canvas view.
    SpenContextMenu.ContextMenuListener
    Listener to notify context menu action event
    SpenControlListener
    The listener interface for callbacks that are called about the state of control on view.
    SpenDrawListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen draw events.
    SpenEraserChangeListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for eraser state events.
    SpenFlickListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen flick events.
    SpenHoverListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for hover events.
    SpenHyperTextListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for hyper -text events.
    SpenLongPressListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for long press events on the canvas view.
    SpenObjectRuntime.UpdateListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Spen ObjectRuntime update events.
    SpenObjectRuntimeManager.InstallListener
    Listener for plug-in installation and uninstallation events
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving plug-in installation and uninstallation events
    SpenPageEffectListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for page effect setting events.
    SpenPenChangeListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen settings events.
    SpenPenDetachmentListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for S Pen attachment and detachment events.
    SpenRemoverChangeListener
    This listener interface provides callbacks for remover change events.
    SpenReplayListener
    This listener interface provides callback events for replay events on the canvas view.
    SpenSelectionChangeListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving selection change events.
    SpenShapeChangeListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving shape settings change events.
    SpenSimpleViewInterface  
    SpenStrokeFrameListener
    The interface for receiving result of StrokeFrame.
    SpenTextChangeListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for text settings events.
    SpenTouchListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for touch events.
    SpenZoomListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for canvas zoom events.
    SpenZoomPadListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for zoom pad stop events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SpenCapturePage
    This class provide that setting page captured all objects.
    SpenContextMenu
    This class provides the methods for managing context menus.
    SpenContextMenuItemInfo
    Menu Item class for Context Menu.
    SpenControlBase
    Control Base is a common control class for the object which been selected.
    SpenControlContainer
    ControlContainer is a sub class of ControlBase.
    SpenControlImage
    The control class that manages image object.
    SpenControlLine
    The control class that manages line object.
    SpenControlList
    The control class that manages list object.
    SpenControlShape
    The control class that manages shape object.
    SpenControlStroke
    The control class that manages stroke object.
    SpenControlTextBox
    This class provides methods for managing selected text objects.
    SpenHighlightInfo
    This class contains and manages highlight settings information.
    SpenMultiView
    This class provides methods for managing Pen multiviews.
    SpenObjectRuntime
    ObjectRuntime class This class contains methods for controlling ObjectRuntime.
    To use this class, create an instance using ObjectRuntimeManager.
    SpenObjectRuntimeInfo
    This class contains and manages the ObjectRuntime information
    SpenObjectRuntimeManager
    This class manages the ObjectRuntime
    SpenSimpleSurfaceView
    This class provides methods for managing a simple view based GL.
    SpenSimpleView
    This class provides methods for managing a simple view based GL.
    SpenSurfaceView
    This class provides the methods for managing a drawing surface.
    SpenTextMeasure
    This class provides the methods for managing text-related measurements.
    SpenView
    This class provides the functionality for the Pen user interface.
